text: @axios They've never made a vaccine that stops coronavirus. It's deadly to take these drugs. Why in the name of GOD isn't the WHO testing this all-natural free Scottish tonic? It stops COVID-19 and any other virus within hours. No need for ventilators. It's real protection now. https://t.co/hHVOaKV4XN
